## Note

* The in-game description does not have damage context, and only shows "0 Raw Damage". The actual value is 10% of the damage dealt on hit (a hit in this case meaning anything above and including a Graze), which is then dealt as [Raw](/raw/) damage every 3.0 sec for 6.0 sec.
** The damage stacks, but not the duration - each stack retains its own duration and is tracked separately.
** The damage is dealt at the start of every 3.0 sec, meaning the bonus damage will be dealt immediately upon hit. Assuming that the duration is 6.0 sec, damage will then be dealt two more times after.
** The duration (not the tick rate / interval), scales with [[Intellect] as with all durations.
